description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Block Smash is a challenging block puzzler. The idea of the game is to get three blocks of the same color in a horizontal or vertical row in order to remove them from the grid. For each level you are given a certain amount of blocks to use in order to complete the level.
description.short: Block Smash is a challenging block puzzler. The idea of the game is to get three blocks of the same color in a horizontal or vertical row in order to remove them from the grid. For each level you are given a certain amount of blocks to use in order to complete the level.
